game.name: World War 2 Agenda
game.shortDescription: An old-style PC game to honor the British, American and Russian soldiers who fought and defeated the Nazi Socialist party. Go behind enemy lines and destroy the Nazi Globalist agenda during World War 2.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An old-style PC game to honor the British, American and Russian soldiers who fought and defeated the Nazi Socialist party. Go behind enemy lines and destroy the Nazi Globalist agenda during World War 2.
